documentation.text: @title Contract for Liars Dice single hand version of the game
@dev number of dice given initially per player
@dev All the money from will be tranfered to this account.

@dev app fron end can check this and call functions to other players reveled dice so 
 that they can  be diplayed to player
@dev number of players that need to be join to start the game
@dev number of players that are still in the game
@dev current round number
@dev the amount each player has to pay to play the game.
@dev Front end app shows this by concatenating with string player (instead of address show as player 1, player 2 etc)
@dev players list player at pos 0 will strat the first bid and turns go in clock wise direction.
@dev Info associated with players for all players
@dev stores the number of dice with that face value, updated after getting unHashed face value from each player
@notice Constructor initialize default values

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Not enough money sent to join game"

arguments.value: Not enough money sent to join game

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Not enough money sent to join game"

documentation.text: @notice  Fallback function to receive any transfers

@dev number of dice given initially per player
@dev All the money from will be tranfered to this account.

@dev app fron end can check this and call functions to other players reveled dice so 
 that they can  be diplayed to player

@dev number of players that are still in the game
@dev current round number
@dev the amount each player has to pay to play the game.
@dev Front end app shows this by concatenating with string player (instead of address show as player 1, player 2 etc)
@dev players list player at pos 0 will strat the first bid and turns go in clock wise direction.

deployer.details: All the money from will be tranfered to this account.

gameCost.details: the amount each player has to pay to play the game.

numActivePlayers.details: number of players that are still in the game

numPlayers.details: number of players that need to be join to start the game

numSetDice.details: number of dice given initially per player

playerList.details: players list player at pos 0 will strat the first bid and turns go in clock wise direction.

players.details: Info associated with players for all players

revealUpdateReady.details: app fron end can check this and call functions to other players reveled dice so  that they can  be diplayed to player

rollFaceValues.details: stores the number of dice with that face value, updated after getting unHashed face value from each player

stage.details: Current stage of the game, fron end apps should call appropriate functions based on stage and display  relavent info to players like showing other players dice after challenge, Ask users to roll, bid/challenge (in addition to getting the turn info)

winnerPlayerPos.details: Front end app shows this by concatenating with string player (instead of address show as player 1, player 2 etc)

devdoc.title: Contract for Liars Dice single hand version of the game
